哩.definition: (modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])

哩哩啦啦.definition: scattered; intermittent; sporadic; on and off; stop and go

哩哩囉囉.definition: verbose or unclear in speech; rambling and indistinct

哩哩羅羅.definition: endless mumbling (onom.); verbose and incomprehensible; talking endlessly
